definition: (of trains etc) to set off (on a journey)/to start (being issued or circulated)/to start (happening)/originating
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: So many big arguments begin with small comments.
sentences.chinese: 許多大的爭論往往始發於微小的談話。

sentences.english: Heat quickly penetrated the cotton and began to roast my hand.
sentences.chinese: 棉紗上的溫度很快上來了，我的手也開始發燙。

sentences.english: Wei Wei once wrote a short novel, read as Starting from Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 魏微寫過一個短篇，叫做《從南京始發》。

sentences.english: From there we were all taken to the Bus departure station Daimon Station.
sentences.chinese: 從那裏，我們都帶到公共汽車始發站大門站。

sentences.english: The Germans had surrendered! Our "bamboo radio" had brought the news.
sentences.chinese: 俟此事過，消息始發自營內的主腦人物，德國投降了。

sentences.english: At the completion of the process, EXE finally opens the switch and the power grid starts.
sentences.chinese: 在過程完成之後，艾克斯最後打開開關，開始發功。

sentences.english: Almost immediately the KMT rumor machine slipped into overdrive.
sentences.chinese: 國民黨的造謠部隊幾乎立刻就開始發猋。

sentences.english: Feeding peak of the white-headed leaf monkey varied seasonally.
sentences.chinese: 白頭葉猴覓食高峯的始發時刻呈季節性變化。

sentences.english: The flight originated in New York.
One can definitely get seat tickets at the departure station.
sentences.chinese: 在始發站上必定能買到有座的票。

sentences.english: The "Arab Spring" pro-democracy movement began in Tunisia.
sentences.chinese: “阿拉伯之春”親民主運動始發於突尼斯。

sentences.english: Our folk medicine didn't even have half-measures to offer.
sentences.chinese: 棉紗上的溫度很快上來了，我的手也開始發燙。

sentences.english: The bus originates at Oxford Street.
sentences.chinese: 這輛公共汽車的始發站在牛津大街。

definition: departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
"through train" (refers to the idea of retaining previous legislature after transition to Chinese rule in Hong Kong or Macao)
train or coach service ("service" as in "they run 12 services per day between the two cities")
terminus/final stop on rail or bus line
